attributes.additional_details: to abolish the introduction of pips and continue disability living allowance, in support of the vulnerable people who rely on the government to provide funds to maintain an independent life and in many cases able to be an independent member of the community and able to maintain their independence by working hours that wont compromise their health and medical condition by the means of claiming disability living allowance and in some cases family tax working credit. the introduction of PIPs may compromise and prevent disabled people from continuing to work and remain a valuable member of society.
